name: set_minimum_vav_terminal_flow_fraction
display_name: Set Minimum Vav Terminal Flow Fraction
name_xml: Set Minimum VAV Terminal Flow Fraction
modeler_description: Loops through all AirLoops, setting Zone Minimum Air Flow Input Method to "Constant" and "Constant Minimum Airflow Fraction" to a user specified value for all Airterminal:SingleDuct:VAV:Reheat and Airterminal:SingleDuct:VAV:NoReheat terminals encountered.
